title: Breaking Bad S05E16 Reconstructed Fan Edit 720p WEB x264 Atlanti
description:
This is not the official edit of the episode. This is a Fan Edit.

The reason I did this edit is because I love Breaking Bad and I didn't like the music they used for the very ending of the series. So this edit doesn't change much. Only two changes and only around 40 secs are removed.

1- The music at the end including when Jesse is in the car.
2- We don't actually see the mechanism Walt creates for the gun before it's used. There was absolutely no reason to show it all. Better to keep a little mystery for the end. The shortened version is also moved to before Walt meeting Lydia.
